Leehan

Korean: 이한

20 years old
Group (2023-present):
BOYNEXTDOOR

Introduction

Leehan is a South Korean singer under KOZ Entertainment. He made his official debut as a member of BOYNEXTDOOR on May 30th, 2023.

On July 16, 2024, KOZ Entertainment released a statement that revealed that Leehan had recently developed skin inflammation, and would temporarily halt all group and individual activities to receive sufficient rest and treatment.
